feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 2:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 46 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
